channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Eclipse Che
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Eclipse Che

item.title: CVE-2020-10689|2024-08-04T11:06:11.157Z -- red%20hat -- eclipse%20che
item.description: A flaw was found in the Eclipse Che up to version 7.8.x, where it did not properly restrict access to workspace pods. An authenticated user can exploit this flaw to bypass JWT proxy and gain access to the workspace pods of another user. Successful exploitation requires knowledge of the service name and namespace of the target pod.
